11:45 <vmassol> mflorea: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Contrib/job/xwiki-contrib-application-ckeditor/ seems stuck.  
11:48 <mflorea> [INFO  - 2017-02-03T10:45:40.358Z] SessionManagerReqHand - \_cleanupWindowlessSessions - Asynchronous Sessions clean-up phase starting NOW  
11:49 <mflorea> some problem with the jetty used to run the tests (jasmine maven plugin)  
11:50 <mflorea> this "Asynchronous Sessions clean-up phase starting NOW" stats at 5 minutes interval

13:41 <vmassol> has quit  
13:43 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:35 <ol-ow2> Hi! First question, can i use custom display for checkbox ? if yes, how can i known if the checkbox is checked or not in 'view' mode ? mflorea tmortagne vmassol (related to https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/Bindings+available+inside+the+Custom+Display+property )  
14:36 <ol-ow2> i'm getting all property of it, but not the value (also $value is empty even if the box is showed checked in edit mode)  
14:36 <vmassol> $value doesn't provide this info?  
14:37 <ol-ow2> nop :(  
14:37 <vmassol> ok then I don't know  
14:37 <ol-ow2> :)  
14:37 <ol-ow2> i'm a bit lost this time :D  
14:37 <vmassol> would need to read the code but I'm on something else rightnow, need to finish it  
14:37 <ol-ow2> np ;)  
14:37 <tmortagne> ol-ow2: checkbox is one kind of display for boolean property so what you customize is actually the boolean property and yes it can be customized if you have a field to put code in it  
14:38 <tmortagne> as for the how do you know what is the value it should be $value, what does $value gives you ? null ?  
14:38 <ol-ow2> yes, null  
14:38 <tmortagne> you should have 1 when the boolean is true, 0 if it's false and null  if it's not set  
14:39 <tmortagne> in which state is it supposed to be in your case ?  
14:39 <ol-ow2> 1 or yes i guess  
14:39 <ol-ow2> in edit mode, the box is checked..  
14:40 <tmortagne> well edit mode will will give you a checked box if the default is 1, does not means it's really set until you save it  
14:40 <ol-ow2> at beggining it wasn't, but i've checked the box in edit mode (save and reload, box still checked)  
14:40 <ol-ow2> hum..  
14:40 <tmortagne> ok so I guess it is checked then  
14:40 <ol-ow2> l'et me check the default value  
14:41 <ol-ow2> nothing in default value  
14:41 <tmortagne> (I never wrote a custom boolean displayer myself so mostly talking about theory)  
14:42 <ol-ow2> http://pastebin.com/4RTyua1t  
14:42 <ol-ow2> my code used in custom display  
14:42 <tmortagne> what does $object.getValue($name) fives you ?  
14:42 <tmortagne> s/fives/gives/  
14:43 <ol-ow2> null  
14:44 <tmortagne> are $object and $name set ?  
14:44 <ol-ow2> $object.getValue($name) => null  
14:44 <tmortagne> what version of Xwiki is this ?  
14:44 <ol-ow2> 6.4.4  
14:44 <ol-ow2> form.formulaire\_0\_:: agree :: view :: com.xpn.xwiki.api.PropertyClass@69a0621b  
14:44 <ol-ow2> $object.getValue($name)  
14:45 <ol-ow2> $prefix :: $name :: $type :: $field  
14:46 <ol-ow2> $object => com.xpn.xwiki.api.Object@44bfe1f8  
14:46 <ol-ow2> so object contains something yes  
14:47 <tmortagne> and $name ?  
14:47 <tmortagne> ha right, "agree"  
14:47 <ol-ow2> $name is 'agree'  
14:47 <tmortagne> so getValue does not exist in 6.4.4  
14:47 <ol-ow2> great :D !  
14:47 <ol-ow2> there is a workaround ?  
14:48 <tmortagne> talking about $object.getValue here which is just a shortcut, not about $value which should be defined  
14:49 <tmortagne> try $object.getProperty($name).value  
14:49 <tmortagne> that should give the the real value of your property  
14:49 <tmortagne> to make sure it's 1  
14:49 <tmortagne> it's what is supposed to end up in $value shortcut  
14:50 <ol-ow2> still null  
14:50 <ol-ow2> $object.getProperty($name).value  
14:50 <ol-ow2> hum.. let's me regenerate my page  
14:51 <tmortagne> if you get null for $object.getProperty($name).value and both $object and $name are right then I think your property is not set  
14:52 <tmortagne> hmm try $field.value which is supposed to be the same thing  
14:52 <tmortagne> ha no  
14:52 <tmortagne> forget that  
14:52 <ol-ow2> i get all values for all other field, but still null in view mode for bolean  
14:52 <tmortagne> $field is the class not the object  
14:57 <ol-ow2> ok, forget it, it seems i doing something wrong i'm passing the value (when $document.addObjectFromRequest($classes.name) )  
14:58 <ol-ow2> probably the $name (where saved) isn't the same where i'm checking :(  
15:00 <tmortagne> ok  
15:00 <ol-ow2> sorry for disturb  
15:01 <ol-ow2> also thanks for information about getValue & xwiki 6.4.4  
15:01 <ol-ow2> usefull to know  
15:12 <tmortagne> ol-ow2: actually I made a mistake, bad memory, getValue was introduced in 6.2  
15:12 <tmortagne> so you should have it in 6.4.4  
15:13 <tmortagne> since you were getting null I tough maybe it was not in your version  
15:13 <ol-ow2> :D i'm restarting my xwiki  
15:13 <tmortagne> (talking about Object#getValue)  
15:13 <ol-ow2> np tmortagne  
15:36 <D-Spair> has quit  
15:48 <ol-ow2> there is a doc or source of displayer used by default (i mean how bolean was interpreted by the displayer) ? tmortagne vmassol  
15:51 <tmortagne> the default displayer is implemented in Java so it won't help you much if you search inspiration for you Velocity based dislayer, see https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/objects/classes/BooleanClass.java#L126  
15:56 <ol-ow2> that help me in fact ;) thx tmortagne  
15:57 <ol-ow2> in my custom display value was't set  
15:57 <ol-ow2> my mistake  
15:57 <tmortagne> ok  
15:59 <ol-ow2> input HTML need to be set to 1, not for say "true", but just for the request contains something when the input is checked  
16:00 <ol-ow2> input HTML  value need to be\*  
16:04 <ol-ow2> yeaha ! $object.getValue($name) = 1 when checked!

22:38 <vmassol> guys  
22:38 <vmassol> does someone know how we configured ci.xwiki.org to display an image of failing builds on the job result page?  
22:39 <vmassol> for example http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-7.4.x/lastCompletedBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.appwithinminutes/WizardTest/testGoBackToFirstStep/  
22:40 <vmassol> hmm seems it's the description that's modified  
22:40 <vmassol> need to find how it's done now  
23:06 <vmassol> has quit  
23:15 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
23:56 <vmassol> ok found it
